cast.name: 娅丝明·卡西姆 Yasmin Kassim
丹尼尔·麦克弗森 Daniel MacPherson

writer.name: 娅丝明·卡西姆 Yasmin Kassim

introduction: Lie is a story told through moving image and music, a conscious decision that takes our audience on a journey, a journey inspired entirely by their own relationships and life experience. As outsiders to other people's relationships sometimes we like to imagine how they posses a level of perfection we will never be able to touch, but we never truly know what is going on under the surface. Especially those relationships that seem so flawless and so complete, the ones that seem to have it all... So how do you know that your own thoughts aren't anything but a lie? Living out the life you wish you had?
